concept.title: Release notes
concept.shortdesc: Release notes for the 1.0 version of the Go SDK.

section.title: Version 1.0.8 (May 2016)
section.p: Version 1.0.8 is the 9th release of the Go SDK 1.0 0.

ul.li: GOCBC-56: Added experimental support for CBFT.
GOCBC-59: Added support for AT_PLUS query consistency
Corrected issue with query row byte data access.
Corrected issue causing DCP streaming to behave incorrectly.
Improved API documentation.
Removed various error codes which could never be encountered.
Various minor bug fixes.
None

section.title: Version 1.0.7 (May 2016)
section.p: Version 1.0.7 is the 8th release of the Go SDK 1.0 0.

ul.li: GOCBC-95: Implemented Index Management API.
Various minor bug fixes.
Resolved issue with querying introduced in 1.0.6.
None

section.title: Version 1.0.6 (April 2016)
section.p: Version 1.0.6 is the 7th release of the Go SDK 1.0 0.

ul.li: GOCBC-107: Send client name to the server for logging purposes.
GOCBC-104: Added ability to grab raw bytes from the query result.
GOCBC-103: Breaking change to Counter operations to correct the logic bug.
GOCBC-90: Implemented experimental cluster-level authentication.
GOCBC-58: Implemented experimental cluster-level querying.
Various minor bug fixes.
None

section.title: Version 1.0.5 (March 2016)
section.p: Version 1.0.5 is the 6th release of the Go SDK 1.0 0.

ul.li: GOCBC-100: Offline clusters now correctly recover when restarted. Improved logging capabilities of the SDK.
Improved logging capabilities of the SDK.
Various minor changes.
None

section.title: Version 1.0.4 (February 2016)
section.p: Version 1.0.4 is the fifth release of the Go SDK 1.0 0.

ul.li: GOCBC-55: Implemented an experimental API for sub-document operation support.
GOCBC-97: Resolved an issue with recovery from the server failure.
GOCBC-23: Added support for memcached buckets.
GOCBC-77: Implemented the stats operation.
GOCBC-98: Improved handling of common incorrect connection strings.
Various minor changes and documentation improvements.
None

section.title: Version 1.0.3 (January 2016)
section.p: Version 1.0.3 is the fourth release of the Go SDK 1.0 0.

ul.li: Fixed an issue that was causing internal requests to fail.
Improved error handling.
Improved handling of connection cleanup after client shutdown.
Improved behavior of the operation retry when a cluster node disconnects from the client.
Added support for running all tests without a Couchbase Cluster.
Various minor bug fixes.
None

section.title: Version 1.0.2 (December 2015)
section.p: Version 1.0.2 is the third release of the Go SDK 1.0 0.

ul.li: Various minor bug fixes.
None

section.title: Version 1.0.1 (November 17, 2015)
section.p: Version 1.0.1 is the second release of the Go SDK 1.0 0.

ul.li: GOCBC-70: Fixed the issue related to prepared statement execution.
GOCBC-68: Handle deleted buckets properly.
Fixed the bug related to passing interface pointers to storage methods.
Various other minor bug fixes.
Added ability to shut down connections.
Various performance improvements.
None

section.title: Version 1.0.0 (16 September 2015)
section.p: Version 1.0.0 is the first GA release of the Go SDK.

ul.li: Support for Couchbase Server 4.0 Enhanced Durability.
Support for Prepared Statements.
Corrected an issue where an incorrect value type passed to Get would panic.
Moved package to github.com/couchbase rather than github.com/couchbaselabs.
Numerous minor bug fixes.
Mutation Tokens are disabled by default and cannot be enabled through gocb (only via gocbcore).

section.title: Version 1.0.0-beta [0.9.0] (7 July 2015)
section.p: Version 1.0.0-beta is the beta pending our 1.0.0 GA release of the Go SDK.

ul.li: Various minor bug fixes.
None

section.title: Version 0.3.0 (16 June 2015)
section.p: Version 0.3.0 continues the progression towards a 1.0.0 GA release of our Go SDK.

ul.li: Added support for performing bulk operations.
Added support for N1QL querying.
Added support for durability requirements.
Added support for GeoSpatial view queries.
Numerous performance enhancements.
Added additional user-oriented error handling functionality.
Added further options to GetReplica method.
Added support for specifying various internal timeouts.
Various minor bug fixes.
None

section.title: Version 0.2.0 (9 March 2015)
section.p: Version 0.2.0 continues the progression towards a 1.0.0 GA release of our Go SDK.

ul.li: Added support for performing management operations.
Significant refactoring of the code base to enhance performance and testability.
Various minor bug fixes.
None

section.title: Version 0.1.0 (25 February 2015)
section.p: Version 0.1.0 was the first official release of our Go SDK.
